author: Joseph Green
title: The best laptops for working from home in the UK
description: Complaining about the office can be therapeutic. Constant criticism of the temperature, space, and snack selection is something that binds a workforce and helps everyone to get through the day. It's really not that bad, though. Sure, the office has its faults…
content:
Complaining about the office can be therapeutic. Constant criticism of the temperature, space, and snack selection is something that binds a workforce and helps everyone to get through the day. It's really not that bad, though.
Sure, the office has its fault… [+6746 chars]
